/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and an array of buildings on the other. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, punctuated by the radiant glow of the sun. The image encapsulates the vibrancy and energy of city life in Beijing.
